nodes.text: The Mid-Core was a region of the Core Worlds.
The Mid-Core was an area of space located in the Core Worlds.
The Hydian Way was a major trade route that ran from the Mid-Core out to the Corporate Sector. It intersected the Perlemian Trade Route at the planet Brentaal IV, in the Ringali Shell.
The Ringali Shell was situated between the Mid-Core and the Colonies.
The Nopces system was a minor star system in the Bormea sector, which was located on the Mid-Core edge of the Darpa sector, along the Hydian Way.

The Mid-Core was a major exporter of raw materials. Most worlds in the Core imported their raw materials from the Mid-Core or beyond, as they had long ago depleted their own star systems of such resources.
Between 1 BBY and 1 ABY, the Independent Traders' Infonet reported news from an unspecified Mid-Core node.
During the Galactic Civil War, Halbard was a notable shipping magistrate in the Mid-Core.
